[DQC.US.0116.9726] The company has reported a value of TPT Media and Entertainment for the concept us-gaap:BusinessCombinationReasonForBusinessCombination. It is expected that this fact uses the BusinessAcquisitionAxis and not the AssetAcquisitionAxis as asset acquisitions should not use the element BusinessCombinationReasonForBusinessCombination. Consider changing the axis used with this fact to the BusinessAcquisitionAxis.
